value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want

value.title: Configure data sources for Power BI Reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how you can configure the data source of a Power BI report within Power BI Report Server. value.excerpt: I walk through how to configure Kerberos to get Power BI reports within SQL Server Reporting Services running in a distributed environment. value.title: Connect from Power BI Mobile to SSRS using OAuth
value.excerpt: Connect from Power BI Mobile to SSRS using OAuth  In this video, I show you how to configure Active Directory Federated Services (ADFS) and the Web Application Proxy (WAP) role, in Windows 2016, so that you can connect from Power BI mobile to SQL Server Reporting Services using OAuth.  The ADFS and WAP

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Preventing Data Silos with Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick and Kalyn look at data silos and how to prevent it using Power BI. Different options exist, such as Analysis Services, Azure Analysis Services or models hosted in the Power BI service.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube --
